discoveries.finding: New LightX2V LoRA replaces CausVid for speed
discoveries.details: LightX2V is a new speed LoRA that provides improved motion and can replace CausVid. It's trained for 4 steps and provides transformative results

discoveries.finding: LightX2V performs better at 4 steps than higher step counts
discoveries.details: The LoRA is specifically trained for 4 steps. At 6+ steps it becomes overcooked, while 4-5 steps provide optimal results

discoveries.finding: MovieGen benchmark prompts available for testing
discoveries.details: Self-Forcing repo contains MovieGen benchmark prompts that are useful for testing video generation models

discoveries.finding: Merged models use less VRAM than loading multiple LoRAs
discoveries.details: Using a merged model eliminates VRAM overhead from loading multiple LoRAs dynamically, allowing for better performance without block swap

discoveries.finding: UniPC scheduler has issues separating camera and object movement
discoveries.details: UniPC scheduler cannot move only objects without camera movement - everything moves together when using UniPC

discoveries.finding: Context window shifts are visible in video generation
discoveries.details: You can visually detect when the context window shifts during video generation, affecting motion continuity

discoveries.finding: NAG enables negative prompts to work with CFG 1 workflows
discoveries.details: NAG allows negative prompts to function again for accelerated CFG 1 workflows like caus/acc derived workflows

discoveries.finding: MAGREF uses pixel-wise masks with channel concatenation
discoveries.details: Unlike previous methods that concatenate reference images along token dimension, MAGREF applies pixel-wise masks and combines via channel concatenation for better identity preservation

discoveries.finding: MAGREF works out of the box without modifications
discoveries.details: MAGREF I2V model works immediately without needing any special setup or changes

discoveries.finding: T2V LoRAs work on I2V models
discoveries.details: LoRAs trained for T2V models can be used effectively on I2V models, including cfg/step distill LoRAs

discoveries.finding: lightx2v LoRA excellent for morphs and animated logos
discoveries.details: The lightx2v LoRA produces unexpected and awesome results for morphs and animated logos

discoveries.finding: Context windows work better with MAGREF than normal I2V
discoveries.details: Context windows perform better with MAGREF I2V model compared to standard I2V

discoveries.finding: LightX2V LoRA works for both T2V and I2V
discoveries.details: Can be used with both text-to-video and image-to-video generation modes

discoveries.finding: MAGREF works better with 121 frames @ 24 fps
discoveries.details: Testing shows improved performance at this specific frame count and fps setting

discoveries.finding: Preview capability allows quick iteration
discoveries.details: With lightx2v LoRA you can see what generation will look like in first or second step, allowing quick cancellation of bad looking ones

discoveries.finding: MAGREF + ATI combination suggested for testing
discoveries.details: Kijai suggests trying MAGREF with ATI (moving points tech) together

discoveries.finding: ComfyUI memory leak issue identified
discoveries.details: Workflows that worked for months now causing OOM with RAM on every run unless ComfyUI is restarted

discoveries.finding: Widget to string KJ node causes workflow resampling issues
discoveries.details: The node is set to re-run each time on purpose with specific code that makes any node re-evaluate on each queue, causing samplers to resample even with same parameters

discoveries.finding: UniPC scheduler provides significant quality jump with wrapper
discoveries.details: The quality improvement is likely due to wrapper's use of stateful FlowUniPCMultistepScheduler which isn't compatible with native ComfyUI

discoveries.finding: MagCache is faster and better than TeaCache
discoveries.details: With 5 steps, MagCache skips 2 of them and is somehow still faster than 3 steps without MagCache

discoveries.finding: MultiTalk can generate 177 frames without context tricks
discoveries.details: Audio-driven lip sync can generate long sequences in single pass, though their pipeline does three passes making it very slow

discoveries.finding: Phantom samples extra reference frames
discoveries.details: When setting 81 frames, Phantom actually samples 89 frames because references are included in the sampled latents

discoveries.finding: LightX2V LoRA used at far too low shift values
discoveries.details: Should use 7.0 sigma_max and 100 shift with 2 sampler workflow for better motion and quality

discoveries.finding: Context window transitions cause cross fades with speed LoRAs
discoveries.details: 100% occurrence rate when using stack of LoRAs, less frequent with 8-step workflow

discoveries.finding: VACE mask requirements
discoveries.details: Needs RGB 123,123,123 exactly for gray fill, mask shape influences assumptions

discoveries.finding: Native vs Wrapper speed difference resolved
discoveries.details: Initially showed 3x speed difference (4s/it vs 12s/it) but fixed after restart - speeds are equal when configured correctly

discoveries.finding: Mixing T2V with Phantom allows better prompt adherence and produces output that regular T2V can't do
discoveries.details: Everything gets amplified, including stuff in long prompts that struggle to appear, but artifacts are also amplified. Use a small percentage of Phantom

discoveries.finding: Shift parameter relationship to sigma_max
discoveries.details: About 14 shift per 1.0 sigma was about right to balance the increase in sigma_max

discoveries.finding: High shift values create more motion and feel sped up
discoveries.details: Higher shift gives more movement and is a way to get 'more frames' for the same speed

discoveries.finding: NAG hurts movement
discoveries.details: User stopped using NAG because it reduced movement in generations

discoveries.finding: MagRef works better without clip vision for character likeness
discoveries.details: Character likeness is much higher when removing clip vision

discoveries.finding: One step Ultimate SD Upscale produces nearly identical results to four steps
discoveries.details: At denoise 0.4, visual difference between 1 step and 4 steps is minimal, saves significant time

discoveries.finding: dpm_2_ancestral sampler with beta scheduler produces exceptional quality
discoveries.details: Described as 'exceptional' quality for Wan, though quite slow. Same combination also worked well with HunyuanVideo

discoveries.finding: Multitalk uses 3 model predictions per step in original code
discoveries.details: Does positive, negative, and without audio predictions with 40 steps, making it extremely slow

discoveries.finding: Multitalk has local audio attention
discoveries.details: Audio attention is very localized - background characters don't get animated by the audio

discoveries.finding: Camera movement breaks multitalk contexting
discoveries.details: Moving camera disrupts the lip sync and animation quality

discoveries.finding: UltraWan LoRA trained on 4K dataset
discoveries.details: Based on Wan-T2V-1.3B, small model size, works in any workflow

discoveries.finding: Wan models perform worse past 81 frames without context windows
discoveries.details: Quality degrades when going beyond 81 frames unless using context windows

discoveries.finding: 1.3B model can be used for upscaling with good results
discoveries.details: Using specific workflows with MPS + HPS + Self Forcing LoRAs helps immensely since 1.3B was not trained on high quality dataset

discoveries.finding: UltraWan LoRA enables 1k/4k resolution videos on Wan 1.3B T2V
discoveries.details: Generates high resolution videos but has CC4 non-commercial license due to YouTube dataset

discoveries.finding: MultiTalk lip-sync works on 12GB VRAM
discoveries.details: Successfully generated 321 frames with 5 steps on 12GB card

discoveries.finding: Custom node for automatic resolution optimization
discoveries.details: Node automatically finds optimal resolution for WanVideo and resizes input accordingly - 1920×1080 becomes 832×480 for 480p or 1280×720 for 720p

discoveries.finding: lightx2v scheduler preference dramatically affects results
discoveries.details: ddim_uniform scheduler is WAY better than simple/normal schedulers - others kill camera motion, seed variation, and style-based prompt adherence

discoveries.finding: 5090 performance with MultiTalk
discoveries.details: 1041 frames at 832x480 with 5 steps completed in 10:32 (126.45s/it), much faster without blockswapping

discoveries.finding: uni3c can lock camera movement for context windows
discoveries.details: Using uni3c with just 32 overlap can lock camera position, reducing artifacts in context windows

discoveries.finding: loudnorm is crucial for MultiTalk quality
discoveries.details: The model is likely trained with loudnorm, making it very important for proper results

discoveries.finding: MultiTalk works primarily with English and Chinese
discoveries.details: Spanish doesn't work well, French seems to work. Audio language support is limited

discoveries.finding: Static camera videos work better for long context generation
discoveries.details: Using static camera reference videos reduces motion artifacts and repetitive behavior in long generations

discoveries.finding: Block swap memory usage scales with VRAM
discoveries.details: 16GB VRAM needs 6 blocks swapped, 24GB VRAM needs 25 blocks swapped

discoveries.finding: Audio sampling rate affects playback speed
discoveries.details: 48kHz audio plays slower in ComfyUI, converting to 44.1kHz fixes timing issues

discoveries.finding: MultiTalk can handle edge cases like coughing and special sounds
discoveries.details: MultiTalk specifically picked up on arm raise and cough into sleeve actions, and handles various sound effects beyond just speech

discoveries.finding: MultiTalk works with T2V models
discoveries.details: Can use MultiTalk with T2V models like Phantom and VACE, though VACE code needs slight modifications

discoveries.finding: MAGREF model works better than I2V for MultiTalk
discoveries.details: MAGREF gets much more freedom than I2V models and works way better with context windows

discoveries.finding: MultiTalk can use multiple reference images
discoveries.details: Testing shows you can feed multiple images to MultiTalk for different angles/poses

discoveries.finding: Diffusers 0.33 required for Uni3C
discoveries.details: Need to update diffusers to version 0.33 to resolve 'No module named diffusers.models.transformers.transformer_wan' error

discoveries.finding: MultiTalk works with pure text-to-video using denoise 1
discoveries.details: Can generate lip-synced videos directly from text prompt and audio without needing input images

discoveries.finding: MAGREF model works in native ComfyUI without custom nodes
discoveries.details: I2V model that produces good likeness similar to Phantom, doesn't require wrapper nodes

discoveries.finding: Video-to-video with lower denoising values preserves more of original video
discoveries.details: The more you lower denoiser in ksampler the more you get output of the original video

discoveries.finding: Using input video guides even with light guidance improves results
discoveries.details: Results end up looking much better even if the guidance is light, gives dynamism from input video

discoveries.finding: UltraWan LoRA has two variants - 1k and 4k resolution
discoveries.details: High-res LoRA for 1.3B model trained on very high res content, 1k variant works but 4k causes black output

discoveries.finding: NAG allows negative prompts with CFG=1 models
discoveries.details: New method that lets you use CFG-like functionality when CFG has to be 1, works for video generation

discoveries.finding: Wrapper workflows don't show the weird first few frames flash/grid thingy
discoveries.details: The flash/grid artifact seems to be built into the sampler node and only appears with high frame counts

discoveries.finding: UltraWan 1k LoRA produces much cleaner results than 4k version
discoveries.details: 4k version duplicates things and produces garbage, while 1k works well at 6 steps and 1600x688 resolution

discoveries.finding: GGUF models produce cleaner videos
discoveries.details: Native GGUF setup produces insanely clean results at 2-4 steps

discoveries.finding: MultiTalk works with animals and draws realistic teeth
discoveries.details: Unlike FantasyTalking, MultiTalk can work with animals and properly draws cat teeth instead of human teeth

discoveries.finding: NAG affects entire composition, not just targeted elements
discoveries.details: Rejecting 'blonde hair' changed the entire video composition because NAG operates at conceptual level where hair color associates with lighting, environments, and other visual elements

discoveries.finding: Fun InP MPS with LightX2V works at 3 steps
discoveries.details: Combination generates videos in 3 steps, but 4 steps produces buggy/noisy results

discoveries.finding: Chinese-wav2vec2-base trained at 16fps, MagRef at 15fps
discoveries.details: Different frame rates between models may cause syncing issues, while MultiTalk Wav2Vec node hardcoded to 25fps

discoveries.finding: 44.1khz audio frequency is key for MultiTalk lip sync
discoveries.details: Using 44.1khz audio instead of default 48khz significantly improves lip synchronization quality

discoveries.finding: MultiTalk works with solid black frame as input
discoveries.details: Can use a solid black frame as input image for MultiTalk instead of requiring a face image, useful for generating speakers from scratch

discoveries.finding: Phone camera movement can drive Uni3C for organic motion
discoveries.details: Recording handheld camera movement with phone and feeding to Uni3C creates more organic movement than 3D rendered paths

discoveries.finding: LightX2V may eliminate need for CausVid and AccVid
discoveries.details: Testing shows LightX2V alone provides same speed as using multiple LoRAs with better detail retention and less flux-face artifacts

discoveries.finding: UltraWan 1K LoRA can work with Wan 14B through zero padding
discoveries.details: Expanding 2D LoRA weights from 1536x1536 to 5120x5120 by copying original values to upper left and filling rest with zeros allows some compatibility

discoveries.finding: UltraWan + self-forcing works on Wan 1.3B
discoveries.details: Alisson Pereira tested UltraWan + self forcing for Wan 1.3B showing visible improvement

discoveries.finding: Chatterbox provides voice cloning comparable to ElevenLabs
discoveries.details: Zero-shot voice cloning using short audio samples, performs TTS and voice-to-voice conversion

discoveries.finding: MultiTalk supports video-to-video with lip sync
discoveries.details: Can take input video and apply lip sync while preserving video content

discoveries.finding: Higher fps improves lip sync quality
discoveries.details: 48fps and 60fps with CFG 1 produce better lip sync than 30fps CFG 6

discoveries.finding: Self-forcing LoRA works with up to 4 steps, tested with 8 steps
discoveries.details: Self-forcing DMD can work with low step counts for acceleration

discoveries.finding: T2V LoRAs on I2V can change style
discoveries.details: Using T2V LoRAs on I2V skips the input image but provides same context, allowing style changes

discoveries.finding: Wan 14B generates better at small resolutions like 350x350 without anime artifacts
discoveries.details: Unlike 1.3B which tends toward anime style at small resolutions

discoveries.finding: Wan v2v can upscale extremely low resolution videos effectively
discoveries.details: Successfully upscaled 160x90 video to 1280x720 and 385x216 to 1280x720 with good results using FusionX + LightX

discoveries.finding: Denoise strength affects upscale quality dramatically
discoveries.details: 0.1-0.5 denoise keeps similar to original, 0.7+ removes pixelation better, 1.0 becomes creative upscale

discoveries.finding: FusionX model performs better than base Wan for upscaling
discoveries.details: Base Wan with LightX looks more pixelated compared to FusionX with LightX for same upscaling task

discoveries.finding: MultiTalk controlnet strength affects movement significantly
discoveries.details: 40% controlnet strength provides better movement than 100%, 0% gives too much movement but good character transformation

discoveries.finding: More steps allows higher CFG values in LightX
discoveries.details: 12 steps enables CFG >1 which can be helpful, contrary to expectation that more steps would be 'fried'

discoveries.finding: Block swapping enables 1920x1080 upscaling on RTX 5090
discoveries.details: Using block swapping to manage memory, was able to upscale videos to 1920x1080 resolution

discoveries.finding: MultiTalk works with 720p model
discoveries.details: MultiTalk lip sync works on 720p model, though settings may need adjustment

discoveries.finding: Audio gain significantly improves MultiTalk results
discoveries.details: Turning up audio gain from default 1 to 2 or 3 dramatically improves lip sync quality, even picks up inhales and neck muscle movements

discoveries.finding: LightX2V at 2.0 strength restores hand movements
discoveries.details: Cranking LightX2V to 2.0 strength brought back hand movements that were lost at lower settings

discoveries.finding: Video to video upscaling much faster than Ultimate SD upscale
discoveries.details: Video to video workflow significantly faster than Ultimate SD upscale for same quality results

discoveries.finding: UltraWan enables 1920x1080 generation with Wan 1.3b
discoveries.details: LoRA trained on 58.8k high-resolution videos to enable 1080p/4k video generation using Wan 1.3b model

discoveries.finding: Non-diffusion upscaling can be very fast
discoveries.details: Non-diffusion upscale methods can be much faster - 138s for 81 frames scaling from 576x1024 x2

discoveries.finding: MultiTalk can be combined with uni3C for camera movement
discoveries.details: The lipsync is in multitalk branch but camera movement is in master using uni3C, which can infer motion while keeping other inputs working

discoveries.finding: Phantom can create full 3D character perspectives from single image
discoveries.details: Can create entire 3D perspective set with 2-3 phantom generations using rotation/pan prompts, then extract stills for character training

discoveries.finding: WAN differential diffusion works automatically with inpainting
discoveries.details: Differential diffusion is automatically enabled for WAN inpainting without manual setup

discoveries.finding: Video upscaling with context options works well
discoveries.details: Context options set to 121 with block swap 40 successfully processed 630 frames at 1024x576 using only 7.5GB max VRAM

discoveries.finding: Uni3C has frame limitation
discoveries.details: Uni3C doesn't work above 81 frames, even with context window off

discoveries.finding: MultiTalk error fix
discoveries.details: TypeError 'NoneType' object not callable was caused by wrong wav2vec model

discoveries.finding: MagRef tensor errors from aspect ratios
discoveries.details: 1024x600 causes tensor size mismatch errors, 1024x576 works fine

discoveries.finding: Normal maps work better than depth for VACE
discoveries.details: Normal maps give better adherence and sharper outputs than depth maps, without color bleeding

discoveries.finding: BlockSwap node improves results
discoveries.details: Just plugging in the blockswap node without swapping anything makes cloth simulation better

discoveries.finding: GGUF models produce superior results
discoveries.details: Native workflows with GGUF models give better quality than wrapper versions

discoveries.finding: UltraWan LoRA can be used for upscaling Wan videos
discoveries.details: Using 1.3B model with UltraWan LoRA to upscale 14B videos to FHD, shows subtle improvements in face, eyes, clothes and hands detail

discoveries.finding: Color match node eliminates flash issues
discoveries.details: Color match node combined with other tweaks can eliminate the slight flash introduced during upscaling

discoveries.finding: Removing CausVid causes generations to follow prompt less
discoveries.details: Removing causvid makes generations follow the prompt less, but doesn't seem to make quality difference otherwise

discoveries.finding: Image saturation node fixes color/brightness variation
discoveries.details: Adding image saturation node between decoder and video combine at 0.85-0.90 fixes color consistency issues and WAN flash

discoveries.finding: Phantom can be used as text-to-image generator
discoveries.details: Need to create at least 9 frames and pick the last one, doesn't work well with less than 9 frames, similar to runway's frames or midjourney omni reference

discoveries.finding: Rank 16 vs Rank 32 LoRA format differences
discoveries.details: Rank16 version caused brightness variation issues, switching formats within same LoRA can resolve problems

discoveries.finding: FusionX can be used for video-to-video upscaling with high quality results
discoveries.details: Takes input video and processes through FusionX model, can add prompts for creative upscaling or use no prompt for enhancement

discoveries.finding: Block swapping enables processing very long videos on consumer hardware
discoveries.details: 473 frames at 1024x576 running at only 20.6GB VRAM usage, meaning possible on 3090 cards at home

discoveries.finding: WanVideoWrapper upscaler workflow shows dramatic quality improvements
discoveries.details: Significant enhancement of video quality, described as 'CSI Miami enhance' level improvement

discoveries.finding: Context options critical for avoiding OOMs on longer sequences
discoveries.details: User was getting OOMs under 81 frames on 48GB card until enabling context options

discoveries.finding: MultiTalk branch works better than expected
discoveries.details: Try the MultiTalk branch of Kijai's repo. Works way better than would have been guessed

discoveries.finding: Wan14B with audio support released
discoveries.details: From LightX2V guys, appears to be a speech to video model

discoveries.finding: 14B LoRAs don't work on 1.3B models
discoveries.details: 14b loras can silently fail when loaded on 1.3B models, will look like it's loading but not give error in UI

discoveries.finding: Context overlap fixes MultiTalk loops on longer videos
discoveries.details: Setting context_overlap to around 64 on videos 321+ frames stops introducing extra loops

discoveries.finding: Uni3C doesn't support context currently
discoveries.details: Major limitation for now is that uni3c doesn't support context

discoveries.finding: LightX2V realism is reduced compared to FusionX
discoveries.details: Realism is a bit lost with LightX VS fusionX lora settings

discoveries.finding: Radial attention implementation coming to ComfyUI
discoveries.details: New optimization technique from MIT Han Lab coming soon

discoveries.finding: Using LightX LoRA at 1.0 strength with 4 steps produces significantly faster generation but less cinematic realism
discoveries.details: 77 seconds vs 129 seconds for same prompt/seed. Quality trade-off noted for text-to-video

discoveries.finding: Context overlap affects consistency vs variation
discoveries.details: More overlap means more windows generated but more consistency, but also less opportunity for variation between flanking windows

discoveries.finding: Q8 GGUF produces slightly nicer videos than regular models
discoveries.details: Based on extensive testing with human faces

discoveries.finding: SageAttention causes slight quality degradation with graininess
discoveries.details: Comparison shows grainy artifacts when SageAttention is enabled

discoveries.finding: VACE 1.3B can generate in 6 seconds with CausVid or self-forcing 5 steps at 480p
discoveries.details: Fast generation possible at lower resolutions

discoveries.finding: Wan VAE decoding requires context to properly decode video
discoveries.details: When clipping out a single frame from a latent video output, the decoded frame has distorted high saturation color/look (flash). With 5 frames clipped, first 2-3 frames flash then remaining look normal. At 10 frames, full clip decodes normal with no flashing.

discoveries.finding: Wan can be used as text-to-image generator
discoveries.details: Set frame count to 1 and use save image instead of video combine. Works almost on par with other T2I models and can avoid 'flux face'

discoveries.finding: Denoise threshold affects reference image usage
discoveries.details: When using denoise with ref image: 0.80+ ignores ref image and creates new image, 0.79 and under actually uses the ref image

discoveries.finding: Single frames render weird on WAN
discoveries.details: Better to repeat frame 5 times instead of generating just 1 frame

discoveries.finding: Camera shake in I2V can be caused by specific settings
discoveries.details: Camera shake was caused by a particular setting, setting it to 0 removed the shake

discoveries.finding: Turning up MPS to 1.00 helps with quality when doing text to image
discoveries.details: Setting moviigen/MPS to maximum strength improves quality for T2I generation

discoveries.finding: VACE face consistency issues at resolutions below 1024x576
discoveries.details: VACE struggles with reference similarity and faces below certain resolution, unfortunately that resolution is higher than 1024x576 which is practical for most VRAM setups including 48GB

discoveries.finding: LCM sampler + ddim_uniform scheduler fixes seed variation issues
discoveries.details: For native workflows, using LCM sampler with ddim_uniform scheduler fixes motion and style sensitivity issues that other schedulers kill

discoveries.finding: Context overlap helps with videos longer than 5 seconds
discoveries.details: Wan doesn't support anything over 5 seconds without workarounds, but context overlap or using last frame of prior as input for next 5 seconds helps

discoveries.finding: Tile lora upscaler can add significant detail
discoveries.details: Using tile lora with noise injection allows adding significant fine detail to upscaled videos, achieving true upscaling that doesn't change essence of original

discoveries.finding: Align pose node can transfer poses across different scales/positions
discoveries.details: The align pose node can match ControlNet pose to position and scale of person in image, allowing pose transfer from any reference video regardless of aspect ratio/scale/position

discoveries.finding: New Sage Attention 2 Plus provides ~7% speed improvement on RTX 4090
discoveries.details: At 1280x768x81 frames around 7% faster, at 832x480x81 around 5% faster on 4090

discoveries.finding: GGUF files provide slightly higher quality than safetensor versions
discoveries.details: David Snow confirmed quality is slightly higher with GGUF versions

discoveries.finding: MAGREF works better with context windows than other I2V models
discoveries.details: Only I2V model that 'works' because it won't reset to init image on each window

discoveries.finding: LightX2V performs better for I2V than T2V
discoveries.details: Multiple users report better results using LightX2V for image-to-video workflows

discoveries.finding: CausVid V2 is only half the weights of original with attention layers only
discoveries.details: V2 version has first block removed entirely and is experimental concept by Kijai

discoveries.finding: MPS LoRA provides significant quality improvement for Wan models
discoveries.details: Works with non-FUN models and makes a huge quality improvement

discoveries.finding: Color Match node can help fix I2V color shifting
discoveries.details: When doing image to video, colors normally get darker after first frame. A ComfyUI color match node with reference image input can fix this quickly

discoveries.finding: Context windows chunk sampling per step, not per batch
discoveries.details: On every step the model samples the amount of context windows determined by context window size, overlap, context method and overall frame count, then results are blended together

discoveries.finding: VACE can work with MultiTalk but requires specific setup
discoveries.details: VACE uses T2V model while MultiTalk typically uses I2V, but they can work together with proper configuration

troubleshooting.problem: Depth control causing face morphing issues
troubleshooting.solution: Disable depth control and only use dwpose for better character consistency

troubleshooting.problem: Flux generating strange bars and lines at high resolution
troubleshooting.solution: Use Tiled Diffusion node and don't generate above 1 MP in 1 tile, or use Ultimate SD Upscale with proper tiling

troubleshooting.problem: CausVid causing first frame glitching/artifacts
troubleshooting.solution: Use CausVid v1.5 which has block 0 disabled, or manually disable block 0 with block disable node

troubleshooting.problem: Characters talking excessively or barely moving in Phantom
troubleshooting.solution: Add 'talking' to negative prompts, adjust steps (Q8 4 steps slows motion, 6 steps causes chattering)

troubleshooting.problem: Background flickering when using CausVid
troubleshooting.solution: Put a completely black or white image in one of the input nodes to stop flicker

troubleshooting.problem: Uni3C nodes not appearing despite being in main repo
troubleshooting.solution: User may have installed different branch - check ComfyUI-WanVideoWrapper main repo

troubleshooting.problem: Fun reward LoRAs show console warnings but still work
troubleshooting.solution: Command window indicates it's not 100% happy but quality improvement is still significant

troubleshooting.problem: VACE encoder stacking causes strength issues
troubleshooting.solution: Only the first node in encoder chain can have lower strength/step cutoffs - later nodes affect all previous encoders

troubleshooting.problem: Normals and DW pose encoders won't stack together
troubleshooting.solution: Check for resolution mismatch between preprocessor outputs

troubleshooting.problem: Facial hair interferes with mouth transfer/lip sync
troubleshooting.solution: Shaving improves mouth movement detection accuracy

troubleshooting.problem: Mouth movement detection unreliable
troubleshooting.solution: Use Detail Transfer node with mouth masking, though still not 100% reliable

troubleshooting.problem: Hand motion blur in stylized outputs
troubleshooting.solution: 720p resolution shows small improvement over 576p for small details

troubleshooting.problem: Using i2v workflow for VACE without i2v model
troubleshooting.solution: You need an i2v model for this workflow. If you want to use VACE, look at Kijai's examples in the WANVideoWrapper repo

troubleshooting.problem: Tensor mismatch error 'The size of tensor a (139) must match the size of tensor b (138)'
troubleshooting.solution: Check your clip model - the name may have changed. Re-download the clip file

troubleshooting.problem: Dimensions causing errors
troubleshooting.solution: The dimensions need to be divisible by 16. 1114 is not (neither is 866)

troubleshooting.problem: OOM issues with bf16
troubleshooting.solution: Use fp8 models and turn all nodes to fp16. Never use bf16

troubleshooting.problem: ComfyUI crashes when using context options without ref image
troubleshooting.solution: Context options requires a ref image in the last encode, otherwise it breaks ComfyUI process

troubleshooting.problem: First couple i2v frames distorted and bright
troubleshooting.solution: Reduce CausVid strength from 1.0 to 0.8

troubleshooting.problem: Model merge error with SkyReels
troubleshooting.solution: unet unexpected: ['model_type.SkyReels-V2-DF-14B-720P'] - compatibility issue between models

troubleshooting.problem: OOM when adding WAN Start/End Frame node to VACE workflows
troubleshooting.solution: Set block swapping beat to 40, reduce frame count

troubleshooting.problem: DWPose not detecting complex poses in ComfyUI
troubleshooting.solution: Try lowering keypoint threshold from 0.3 to 0 in wholebody.py

troubleshooting.problem: VACE artifacts when reference image structure differs from input video
troubleshooting.solution: Reference image structure should match first frame of input video for better results

troubleshooting.problem: AttributeError: 'list' object has no attribute 'replace'
troubleshooting.solution: Code modifications needed in ComfyUI-WanVideoWrapper\ATI\nodes.py for trajectory handling

troubleshooting.problem: LoRA keys not loading with MPS LoRA on Fun models
troubleshooting.solution: Works fine despite error messages - trained on Fun which has img attn channels

troubleshooting.problem: ATI only works with 81 frames, other frame counts fail with tensor shape errors
troubleshooting.solution: Use 81 frames as it's hardcoded in original implementation

troubleshooting.problem: ATI start/end percentage parameters not working
troubleshooting.solution: Bug fixed - parameter naming mismatch between 'percentage' and 'percent'

troubleshooting.problem: MPS LoRA errors with 1.3B model
troubleshooting.solution: Use correct model size - MPS LoRA is for 14B model

troubleshooting.problem: Green hue in ATI results
troubleshooting.solution: May be caused by LoRA combinations, try different LoRA settings

troubleshooting.problem: Motion starts before trajectory begins in ATI
troubleshooting.solution: Add background static points to freeze camera and control unwanted motion

troubleshooting.problem: SageAttention error on RTX 5080
troubleshooting.solution: Update Triton and SageAttention versions, ensure torch 2.7.0+

troubleshooting.problem: 'vace_blocks.8.modulation' error when loading VACE
troubleshooting.solution: Nodes need updating for VACE 14B compatibility

troubleshooting.problem: 'WanModel' object has no attribute 'vace_patch_embedding'
troubleshooting.solution: Had wrong VACE model loaded, needed correct version

troubleshooting.problem: VACE only works with T2V message when using I2V
troubleshooting.solution: VACE has its own start frame process designed around T2V workflow

troubleshooting.problem: UniPC causing lack of sharpness and ghosting/aura around characters
troubleshooting.solution: Switch to Euler, Euler A, or DPM++ 2M samplers for better quality

troubleshooting.problem: RTX 5090 TensorRT compatibility issues
troubleshooting.solution: Need CUDA Toolkit 12.9 or 12.8, look for 'sm_125' support in CUDA_COMPUTE_CAPABILITIES. When there's a new CUDA compute version it can take a while for NVIDIA and PyTorch to get in sync.

troubleshooting.problem: LoRA merging failed
troubleshooting.solution: Can't merge LoRAs if they target different layers - If LoRA 1 uses transformer.block.0.attn.q_proj.lora_A but LoRA 2 uses transformer.block.4.mlp.fc1.lora_A they don't stack, they sit separately unless merged directly into a base model

troubleshooting.problem: SageAttention Windows compatibility
troubleshooting.solution: Download from https://github.com/sdbds/SageAttention-for-windows/releases for Windows systems

troubleshooting.problem: VACE mask halo effect
troubleshooting.solution: Issue discussed but no specific solution provided - sometimes shows up, sometimes fine, rules unclear

troubleshooting.problem: SageAttention SM8 kernel error on RTX 5080
troubleshooting.solution: Install SageAttention 2.1.1 from woct0rdho's Windows releases with bundled CUDA, update Triton to 3.3, change attention mode from auto to specific mode

troubleshooting.problem: Black output videos in I2V
troubleshooting.solution: Wan I2V wouldn't work on 'auto' attention mode - try first mode after auto

troubleshooting.problem: Violent shake in generated video
troubleshooting.solution: Too low resolution (368x720) and too little frames - increase both

troubleshooting.problem: Generations getting stuck
troubleshooting.solution: Check GPU memory and utilization - likely silent OOM failure. Use blockswap or shut down other GPU memory apps

troubleshooting.problem: CFG Schedule causing 10x slowdown
troubleshooting.solution: Ignore batched_cfg for any model besides 1.3B - it uses more VRAM and is only viable for cloud GPUs on 14B models

troubleshooting.problem: CFG schedule 'list index out of range' error
troubleshooting.solution: If starting cfg schedule at 1.0 causes error, start at 1.01 instead

troubleshooting.problem: Spline handles appearing as circles instead of parallel
troubleshooting.solution: Make sure not in 'path' mode and update wrapper nodes

troubleshooting.problem: Only getting one track out of 3 spline editors
troubleshooting.solution: May be caused by recent KJnodes update, try updating

troubleshooting.problem: Uni3C model error
troubleshooting.solution: Need diffusers 0.33 or newer

troubleshooting.problem: Vace inpainting halo artifacts
troubleshooting.solution: Use correct gray value for the shot, lower the value to remove halo

troubleshooting.problem: Regular Wan model not working with Uni3C
troubleshooting.solution: Must use ATI model for trajectory control

troubleshooting.problem: ATI with Spline Editor not working
troubleshooting.solution: Frames and spline points to sample needs to match

troubleshooting.problem: CausVid looking 'fake'
troubleshooting.solution: Usually caused by CausVid and AccVid strengths set too high

troubleshooting.problem: System memory fills up and dies during sampling
troubleshooting.solution: Block swap would only help so much since ram gets so full by the end of sampling; comfy just dies when trying to load the vae

troubleshooting.problem: Torch compile disables loras in native wrapper
troubleshooting.solution: Try disabling torch compile node

troubleshooting.problem: Mat error when using merge in Native
troubleshooting.solution: Change resolution maybe, or check workflow settings

troubleshooting.problem: High contrast/overcooked colors with high accvid
troubleshooting.solution: Raise causvid strength to fix overcooked colors that high accvid strengths cause

troubleshooting.problem: Fast motion gets messed up with 3 steps
troubleshooting.solution: Raise accvid strength to 2 and up for 2-3 steps to work

troubleshooting.problem: OOM on sampling with high frame counts
troubleshooting.solution: Use --reserve-vram 2 startup argument

troubleshooting.problem: Workflow corruption when sharing with Get/Set nodes
troubleshooting.solution: Issue traced to purge VRAM nodes causing API calls and model reloads, remove cache clearing nodes to fix loading

troubleshooting.problem: Hair falls apart and looks stringy with VACE
troubleshooting.solution: Try different control nets (pose, depth, canny), use higher steps, add accvid and mps lora, check ref image quality

troubleshooting.problem: OOM with VACE workflows
troubleshooting.solution: Switch to GGUF models for better VRAM management, Q4 gives 20GB more memory

troubleshooting.problem: Characters always talking regardless of prompted scene
troubleshooting.solution: Add 'talking, conversation' to negative prompts or hunt for good seed. If using CFG1, negatives don't work

troubleshooting.problem: Instant OOM when trying to split VACE ref_image embed
troubleshooting.solution: Try tiling VACE encode, use GGUF text encoder and GGUF VACE model

troubleshooting.problem: Over-saturation at end of video generations
troubleshooting.solution: Set CFG to 1 when using certain merged models, avoid CFG scheduling with some models

troubleshooting.problem: Uni3C causing tensor errors
troubleshooting.solution: No specific solution provided, user couldn't get workflow running

troubleshooting.problem: AccVid T2V LoRA causing saturation/contrast issues at high strengths
troubleshooting.solution: Use AccVid I2V LoRA instead, which doesn't have these issues even at higher strengths

troubleshooting.problem: Hair artifacts in generated videos
troubleshooting.solution: Lower shift values (1-2 range) and use 4+ steps instead of 3 steps

troubleshooting.problem: Mouth segmentation fails on low resolution video
troubleshooting.solution: Use pose landmark coordinates instead of segmentation for reliable mouth tracking

troubleshooting.problem: Video Depth Anything causing OOM errors
troubleshooting.solution: Modified version that properly offloads model to CPU after inference to free VRAM

troubleshooting.problem: Enhanced video processing being too slow
troubleshooting.solution: Enhanced processing has minimal speed impact when properly implemented - if slow, check for broken patches

troubleshooting.problem: 4 channel error in VACE
troubleshooting.solution: Remove alpha channel from input images - error indicates presence of alpha channel

troubleshooting.problem: OOM errors with wrapper
troubleshooting.solution: Use block swap feature for manual memory management, or switch to native workflows which have automated memory management

troubleshooting.problem: Halos/outlines in VACE inpainting
troubleshooting.solution: Lower the mask values and avoid feathering the mask - similar to greenscreen compositing

troubleshooting.problem: Control video not working with combined controls
troubleshooting.solution: Don't combine lineart and depth controls - use separate VACE encodes instead

troubleshooting.problem: VAE noise/artifacts in generations
troubleshooting.solution: Switch T5 text encoder and VAE to FP32 precision instead of quantized versions

troubleshooting.problem: VACE pose control showing through in render
troubleshooting.solution: Drop the blend factor to 0.9 or lower to fix it

troubleshooting.problem: Depth control introducing background elements from driving video
troubleshooting.solution: Isolate the subject in driving video by masking out the background

troubleshooting.problem: ComfyUI frontend update broke spline editor causing freezing
troubleshooting.solution: Update to latest KJNodes to fix the freezing issue

troubleshooting.problem: partial_add_cond error when using WanVideo Context Options
troubleshooting.solution: Error occurs when context options node hits sampler, disappears when context options disabled

troubleshooting.problem: WanVideoWrapper showing as N/A in ComfyUI Manager
troubleshooting.solution: Frontend update issue, needs ComfyUI fix or update KJNodes

troubleshooting.problem: Invisible nodes in ATI workflow causing ComfyUI to freeze
troubleshooting.solution: Update KJNodes or try different workflow, problem occurs when ComfyUI can't load certain nodes

troubleshooting.problem: ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'diffusers.models.transformers.transformer_wan'
troubleshooting.solution: Need diffusers 0.33 or higher

troubleshooting.problem: ComfyUI Manager shows nodes as N/A and freezing/disappearing
troubleshooting.solution: Change security to 'Weak' in ComfyUI-Manager/config.ini

troubleshooting.problem: TypeError: FlowMatchEulerDiscreteScheduler.__init__() got an unexpected keyword argument 'use_beta_sigmas'
troubleshooting.solution: Kijai acknowledged this as his mistake and will fix it

troubleshooting.problem: WAN Context Options causing issues
troubleshooting.solution: Kijai acknowledged this as his mistake and will fix it

troubleshooting.problem: Phantom with uni3c tensor size mismatch
troubleshooting.solution: uni3c is only for I2V models and Phantom is technically T2V model - they're incompatible

troubleshooting.problem: Color shift when extending videos with DF
troubleshooting.solution: Use Kijai's color match node and add color filters after

troubleshooting.problem: CUDA errors after updating to CUDA 12.9-1 and pytorch 2.7.1
troubleshooting.solution: Use --disable-cuda-malloc flag when starting ComfyUI

troubleshooting.problem: Block swap causing CUDA issues
troubleshooting.solution: Set use non-blocking to false in block swap settings

troubleshooting.problem: Wan wrapper appearing to reload model when changing LoRA settings
troubleshooting.solution: Setting to main device would keep it loaded instead of offloading

troubleshooting.problem: Getting patches of noise in outputs with patterned textures
troubleshooting.solution: Tried increasing causvid, accvid, enhance-a-video strength, steps and shift but none worked

troubleshooting.problem: VACE inpainting with phantom showing white frames or gray canvas
troubleshooting.solution: Issue occurs when combining VACE inpainting/control video input with phantom while running causvid

troubleshooting.problem: ATI and Uni3C balance issues
troubleshooting.solution: For uni3c to work, had to remove all static points for ATI first, otherwise uni3c had no effects

troubleshooting.problem: Tensor size mismatch when using reference images
troubleshooting.solution: Reference image setup needs 1 less latent to match up properly

troubleshooting.problem: ATI node errors after updates
troubleshooting.solution: Need to update both wrapper and KJNodes - output format changed when multiple splines support was added

troubleshooting.problem: Euler sampler too blurry with Causvid at 6 steps
troubleshooting.solution: Change to dpmpp_2m sampler, euler does not converge quickly enough

troubleshooting.problem: VRAM hitting 100% causes slowdown
troubleshooting.solution: Use startup argument --reserve-vram 2 to leave 2GB more VRAM free

troubleshooting.problem: TeaCache and VACE compatibility
troubleshooting.solution: Fixed in updated patch nodes - TeaCache was broken and disabled VACE

troubleshooting.problem: Self-forcing model won't load in ComfyUI
troubleshooting.solution: Model needs conversion from subdict structure - use Kijai's conversion script or update wrapper to handle model. prefix

troubleshooting.problem: Screen door effect in high-frequency detail areas
troubleshooting.solution: Use more steps (30+), DPM++_SDE sampler, avoid VAE tiling, or use Skip Layer Guidance as second pass

troubleshooting.problem: Real-time generation not working with self-forcing
troubleshooting.solution: Real-time not achievable - even at 512px resolution still needs 1.3+ seconds per frame, limit is about 6fps

troubleshooting.problem: TeaCache acting strange after update
troubleshooting.solution: Set start percent to 0.03 (was previously showing as 3%)

troubleshooting.problem: ComfyUI disconnecting during generation
troubleshooting.solution: Update the wrapper - David Snow confirms it works fine in updated wrapper

troubleshooting.problem: Flash attention taking hours to install
troubleshooting.solution: Version 1 takes hours, version 2 installs much faster - use version 2 or find pre-built wheel

troubleshooting.problem: Flashing/artifacts at video start
troubleshooting.solution: Use node to remove first 3-4 latent frames, or prepare control videos with extra frames at start

troubleshooting.problem: Self-Forcing OOM on 5090
troubleshooting.solution: May need to use fp8 precision or adjust settings - still being investigated

troubleshooting.problem: Using checkpoint loader on diffusion model wastes VRAM
troubleshooting.solution: Don't use checkpoint loader function on diffusion models in ComfyUI - use proper diffusion model loader

troubleshooting.problem: Invalid WanVideo model selected error
troubleshooting.solution: Update the wrapper

troubleshooting.problem: Torch compile issues
troubleshooting.solution: Don't use torch compile

troubleshooting.problem: Cache issues
troubleshooting.solution: Clear cache by deleting triton folder in temp folder

troubleshooting.problem: ControlNet tensor size mismatch with Phantom
troubleshooting.solution: Need to pad control frames since Phantom adds latent(s)

troubleshooting.problem: Multiple spline editor not working
troubleshooting.solution: Update KJNodes to latest version

troubleshooting.problem: Self-forcing i2v conversion
troubleshooting.solution: Use Kijai's conversion script to convert self_forcing_dmd.pt to safetensors format

troubleshooting.problem: VACE struggles with character consistency when combined with control or style loras
troubleshooting.solution: Use VACE alone without other controls for better character preservation, or train character-specific loras

troubleshooting.problem: Context window creates discontinuous video generation
troubleshooting.solution: Multiple attempts needed for consistency, still struggles with maintaining details like sleeve length across sections

troubleshooting.problem: Low quality results with fp8 models and distillation loras
troubleshooting.solution: Increase steps or increase strength on distillation loras like CausVid

troubleshooting.problem: VACE encoder strength affects camera movement vs lighting control
troubleshooting.solution: Lower strength gives better prompt control but less camera following, higher strength locks in reference look but reduces lighting flexibility

troubleshooting.problem: Missing matplotlib library for points editor
troubleshooting.solution: pip install matplotlib

troubleshooting.problem: CUDA out of memory on WanVideoSampler
troubleshooting.solution: Try increasing blocks to 30 to test if VRAM is sufficient

troubleshooting.problem: ComfyUI doesn't see models in subfolders
troubleshooting.solution: Need to manually re-select them in workflows, checking subfolders for same filename is complex

troubleshooting.problem: OOM with multiple VACE embeds
troubleshooting.solution: Must use VACE block swap and at least single VACE block. With block swap enabled, results move to offload_device so should only use more RAM

troubleshooting.problem: Torch out of memory vs allocation error
troubleshooting.solution: If torch out of memory (NOT allocation) it's RAM - disable non-blocking transfers and maybe offload less blocks

troubleshooting.problem: Start/End frame node causing OOM crashes
troubleshooting.solution: Remove the node or enable block swap, crashes happen when inputs are too large for memory

troubleshooting.problem: Flowmatch_causvid dimension error after updates
troubleshooting.solution: Scheduler shouldn't be used outside of actual causvid sampling

troubleshooting.problem: ComfyUI performance issues and OOM
troubleshooting.solution: Roll back ComfyUI to previous version, recent updates causing problems

troubleshooting.problem: CFG schedule float list error in T2V
troubleshooting.solution: Context issue - 'NoneType' object not iterable error in T2V workflows

troubleshooting.problem: Group nodes ignore LoRAs
troubleshooting.solution: Issue with set/get nodes not working with group nodes, use direct connections instead

troubleshooting.problem: VACE color shift in extensions
troubleshooting.solution: Try lowering causvid to 0.7, use 30 steps without causvid, change seed by one, remove ref input for extensions

troubleshooting.problem: 576x1024 resolution maxing out VRAM in new workflow vs old working one
troubleshooting.solution: Use block swap - the new sampler needs more VRAM management

troubleshooting.problem: NAG node increases memory usage by 1.2GB and slows computer
troubleshooting.solution: NAG does two attention passes holding first results in memory, causing extra VRAM usage

troubleshooting.problem: ComfyUI broken after installing MAG and NAG
troubleshooting.solution: Not explicitly resolved in chat

troubleshooting.problem: Phantom degrades quality of 14B model
troubleshooting.solution: Try merging Phantom with T2V model at 0.15-0.25 strength instead of using pure Phantom

troubleshooting.problem: Kijai wrapper freezing and requiring reboot when stopping inference
troubleshooting.solution: Connect main model to model_to_offload input on text encoder node to prevent VRAM issues

troubleshooting.problem: CausVid does not work well with self-forcing model
troubleshooting.solution: Avoid using CausVid with self-forcing model regardless of strength settings

troubleshooting.problem: Torch compiler only works with fp8_e5m2
troubleshooting.solution: Use fp16 model and let the node quantize it, don't use pre-quantized fp8 models with e5m2

troubleshooting.problem: Reference images hit or miss with VACE
troubleshooting.solution: Be quite specific with prompts when using reference images

troubleshooting.problem: Characters randomly spawning at same location in i2v workflows
troubleshooting.solution: Check autoprompt connections - may be trying to generate multiple characters from single person prompt

troubleshooting.problem: Mouth won't stop moving in generated videos
troubleshooting.solution: Try DPM++ scheduler, raise shift parameter, or exclude 'talking' token from prompts

troubleshooting.problem: Kontext API nodes throw errors with first frame
troubleshooting.solution: Use remove image alpha node - API outputs image with alpha channel

troubleshooting.problem: NAG causing OOM on 4090 after few hours
troubleshooting.solution: Issue occurs even with decent free VRAM and only 20 blocks swapped

troubleshooting.problem: Wan2.1 controlnet tensor size mismatch
troubleshooting.solution: Check actual sizes after resize nodes, width/height need to be divisible by 16. 853 height was problematic

troubleshooting.problem: UniAnimate 'WanModel' object has no attribute 'dwpose_embedding'
troubleshooting.solution: Load the UniAnimate lora

troubleshooting.problem: First frame/last frame workflow loops first image instead of ending on second
troubleshooting.solution: Adjust ClipVision Encode ratio and strength settings, reduce strength_1 to 0.8

troubleshooting.problem: OOM and flaky performance with Native nodes
troubleshooting.solution: Use --cache-none in combination with --disable-smart-memory

troubleshooting.problem: ComfyUI memory management issues
troubleshooting.solution: Use janky_memory_patcher node to override comfy's memory management

troubleshooting.problem: Triton permission error
troubleshooting.solution: Follow Reddit fix for sudden Triton error

troubleshooting.problem: Color mismatch in VACE looping
troubleshooting.solution: No clear solution found, can try blending latents or color correction in post

troubleshooting.problem: NAG corrupts output with self-forcing models
troubleshooting.solution: Issue identified but no solution provided

troubleshooting.problem: Native i2v test looks nothing like source image
troubleshooting.solution: Check if using correct i2v model vs VACE

troubleshooting.problem: NAG + torch compile error
troubleshooting.solution: Delete folder c:\Users\******\AppData\Local\Temp\torchinductor_******

troubleshooting.problem: FP8 error on RTXA5000
troubleshooting.solution: GPU can't do FP8, need to choose another model or use e5m2 version instead

troubleshooting.problem: Ultimate SD upscale tensor size mismatch error
troubleshooting.solution: Try disabling the trim latent node - may be trimming video to incompatible frame count

troubleshooting.problem: VACE interpreting flashing lights as masks
troubleshooting.solution: May need to resort to other means like denoisers in Nuke

troubleshooting.problem: Can't get self-forcing model working alone
troubleshooting.solution: Add causvid lora - couldn't get variety of strength or sampler to work with just the lora alone

troubleshooting.problem: Self-forcing with phantom breaks down at 6 steps
troubleshooting.solution: Use 4-5 steps maximum with phantom

troubleshooting.problem: White specs/noise artifacts appearing in renders with LightX2V
troubleshooting.solution: Issue resolved by using correct step count (4 steps) instead of higher values like 8 steps

troubleshooting.problem: LightX2V giving pure noise at 4 steps with Shift 1
troubleshooting.solution: Use higher shift values like 5 or 8 instead of shift 1

troubleshooting.problem: Flashes in video generation when using CausVid below strength 1
troubleshooting.solution: Set new LightX2V LoRA to strength 1.0 and use LCM scheduler to eliminate flashes

troubleshooting.problem: VRAM overflow causing slow block swap
troubleshooting.solution: Use merged models instead of loading multiple LoRAs to reduce VRAM overhead, and run VACE at largest possible resolutions

troubleshooting.problem: CFG scheduling NoneType error
troubleshooting.solution: Return to default text encode node instead of using wanvideo textencodesingle node with NAG

troubleshooting.problem: ComfyUI memory management accumulating RAM
troubleshooting.solution: Need to reboot ComfyUI after one or two runs when changing LoRA settings due to RAM accumulation

troubleshooting.problem: MinimaxRemover masked image error
troubleshooting.solution: Masked image needs to be gray, just like VACE. Update WanVideoWrapper to fix the bug

troubleshooting.problem: Multiple reference images creating nightmare fuel
troubleshooting.solution: Use seed hunting to improve results when using multiple images of same person with MAGREF

troubleshooting.problem: Ultimate SD Upscale only outputting single image instead of video
troubleshooting.solution: Need to plug in the upscale model - it's not optional as initially thought

troubleshooting.problem: Ultimate SD Upscale murdering PC
troubleshooting.solution: Change default tile size from 512 to 256 in custom_nodes\comfyui_ultimatesdupscale\modules\processing.py

troubleshooting.problem: CFG Schedule Float List causing 'NoneType' object not iterable error
troubleshooting.solution: Can't use TextEncodeSingle node with CFG - need to use regular TextEncode nodes

troubleshooting.problem: NAG not working with CFG scheduling
troubleshooting.solution: Don't use TextEncode single node with NAG, use the combined output from NAG node

troubleshooting.problem: Phantom model causing excessive mouth movement
troubleshooting.solution: Use reference image with closed mouth and add facial expression descriptions to prompt

troubleshooting.problem: VRAM constantly maxing out after ComfyUI updates
troubleshooting.solution: Restart ComfyUI between runs to clear memory leaks

troubleshooting.problem: Widget to string node causing workflow resampling
troubleshooting.solution: Comment out or delete the 3 lines of code that force re-evaluation on each queue in nodes.py file

troubleshooting.problem: SLG not working with wrapper
troubleshooting.solution: Set SLG start to 0 instead of 0.2 when using denoise, as ComfyUI handles denoise differently than diffusers

troubleshooting.problem: Video output 2 frames short when using controlnets
troubleshooting.solution: Issue may be related to shift value, CFG, or SLG cutting off last frames

troubleshooting.problem: ATI compatibility with last frame causing tensor size mismatch
troubleshooting.solution: Drop 4 frames from generation frame count as last frame adds a latent causing mismatch

troubleshooting.problem: NAG causing 'NoneType' object is not iterable error
troubleshooting.solution: Can't use single encode with CFG - need two prompts as main embeds or set CFG to 1.0

troubleshooting.problem: Context window cross fades with speed LoRAs
troubleshooting.solution: More overlap may help, but context windows only work with tight motion control

troubleshooting.problem: VACE adding unwanted subjects in mask
troubleshooting.solution: Use gray fill RGB 123,123,123 exactly, use box instead of human-shaped mask, save as image sequence not mp4

troubleshooting.problem: OOM errors with 32GB VRAM
troubleshooting.solution: Use offload_device for anything under 80GB VRAM with 14B model, force_offload=true on text encoders

troubleshooting.problem: NAG compilation error on Windows
troubleshooting.solution: Clear triton cache at C:\Users\username\.triton, may need pip install triton-windows

troubleshooting.problem: Progressive color burning in video extension
troubleshooting.solution: Add color match node after each VAE decode, match to initial frame

troubleshooting.problem: VRAM Management node causing errors
troubleshooting.solution: Bypass the VRAM Management node

troubleshooting.problem: Windows path length issue with Triton
troubleshooting.solution: Edit cache.py and add [:8] after rnd_id in temp_dir line

troubleshooting.problem: VACE mask not working properly with shadows
troubleshooting.solution: Make sure mask is big enough and doesn't include shadows from masked objects

troubleshooting.problem: Hip OOM with wrapper nodes in T2V
troubleshooting.solution: Use ComfyUI native nodes instead of wrapper for T2V, wrapper works better for I2V

troubleshooting.problem: Camera movement not working with masked video input
troubleshooting.solution: Try generating full canvas without mask then compositing and re-diffusing

troubleshooting.problem: 'NoneType' object is not callable error with multitalk
troubleshooting.solution: Need to use the Chinese wav2vec model instead of the English one

troubleshooting.problem: Out of memory with multitalk on AMD
troubleshooting.solution: Try disabling non_blocking transfers and adjusting block swap settings

troubleshooting.problem: Teacache causing issues with multitalk
troubleshooting.solution: Remove teacache entirely - it probably doesn't trigger with low steps and can cause problems

troubleshooting.problem: Differential diffusion darkening characters in Wan
troubleshooting.solution: Try using native implementation instead of wrapper nodes, or adjust mask strength

troubleshooting.problem: VACE inpainting not working
troubleshooting.solution: Make sure noise is enabled - disabling noise breaks the process

troubleshooting.problem: Color shifting in video extensions
troubleshooting.solution: Use color matching node to match to original reference image

troubleshooting.problem: huggingface_hub LocalEntryNotFoundError for Wav2VecModel
troubleshooting.solution: Use huggingface-cli login then huggingface-cli download TencentGameMate/chinese-wav2vec2-base --local-dir . Also pip install pyloudnorm

troubleshooting.problem: fp8 e4m3fn can be finicky on 3090
troubleshooting.solution: Use e5m2 instead of e4m3fn on 3090 cards

troubleshooting.problem: ComfyUI Manager broken with WanVideoWrapper nodes
troubleshooting.solution: Delete old folder and install manually

troubleshooting.problem: Multitalk error 'expected input to have 16 channels, but got 36 channels'
troubleshooting.solution: Need to use I2V model instead of T2V model

troubleshooting.problem: VACE color shift/oversharpen when extending videos
troubleshooting.solution: Use specific settings with denoise 0.4-0.6, then use DaVinci Resolve Magic Mask subject inverted to blur/tweak background

troubleshooting.problem: OOM error during decoding due to clamp operation on GPU
troubleshooting.solution: Modified code to move clamp operation off GPU

troubleshooting.problem: Uni3c tensor size mismatch error
troubleshooting.solution: Ensure uni3c video dimensions match starting frame dimensions exactly

troubleshooting.problem: Audio timing issues in MultiTalk
troubleshooting.solution: Convert audio from 48kHz to 44.1kHz for proper sync

troubleshooting.problem: MultiTalk requires diffusers>=0.33
troubleshooting.solution: Update diffusers to version 0.33 or higher

troubleshooting.problem: Context window jumps in long videos
troubleshooting.solution: Use uni3c repeat with low strength to maintain consistency

troubleshooting.problem: Frame size crashes with certain dimensions
troubleshooting.solution: 636x636 crashes but 631x631 works fine - avoid specific problematic dimensions

troubleshooting.problem: Windows users experiencing performance issues with MultiTalk
troubleshooting.solution: Turn off Discord/streaming/everything and ensure not maxing out VRAM. First run may be bad but subsequent runs should be fine

troubleshooting.problem: AttributeError: 'VaceWanAttentionBlock' object has no attribute 'audio_cross_attn'
troubleshooting.solution: VACE code needs slight change to work with MultiTalk

troubleshooting.problem: Uni3C error 'No module named diffusers.models.transformers.transformer_wan'
troubleshooting.solution: Update diffusers to 0.33 or use pip update diffusers

troubleshooting.problem: MultiTalk nodes not updating through manager
troubleshooting.solution: Use git pull instead of manager updates. Switch to multitalk branch with 'git checkout multitalk' then 'git pull'

troubleshooting.problem: MMAudio generating unwanted vocal background noise
troubleshooting.solution: Use vocal separator tools like Ultimate Vocal Remover or deepextract nodes to remove vocals from background

troubleshooting.problem: OOM errors with WAN encoder at higher frame counts
troubleshooting.solution: Keep frame counts below 500 to avoid GPU memory issues, though some users report success at 2k frames

troubleshooting.problem: OOM with high frame counts during VAE decode
troubleshooting.solution: VRAM issue, tensor on GPU during clamp operation on decode node, needs more VRAM (worked on 5090 with 2k frames)

troubleshooting.problem: Flash at start of videos with higher frame counts
troubleshooting.solution: More frames causes flash at start, avoid going over 81 frames for T2V, use multiples of 4+1 for frame counts

troubleshooting.problem: Wav2Vec tokenizer loading error
troubleshooting.solution: Missing tokenizer files (tokenizer_config.json, vocab.json, special_tokens_map.json), manually download from HuggingFace

troubleshooting.problem: UltraWan 4k LoRA causing black output
troubleshooting.solution: Use 1k variant instead, 4k variant not working properly in ComfyUI

troubleshooting.problem: VideoHelperSuite color shift issue
troubleshooting.solution: Loading and resaving same video makes it more red each time with h264-mp4

troubleshooting.problem: Lipsync fails with longer videos
troubleshooting.solution: Limited to around 69 frames with 41 context, longer durations break consistency and lipsync

troubleshooting.problem: Weird motion artifacts in high frame count generations
troubleshooting.solution: Use Wrapper workflows instead of native nodes to avoid first frame flash/grid artifacts

troubleshooting.problem: MagRef with MultiTalk causing OOM on 3090 48GB RAM
troubleshooting.solution: Try block swap up to 40, use low_mem_load on LoRA loader, or stick with base I2V model

troubleshooting.problem: UltraWan 4k LoRA producing duplicated/garbage results
troubleshooting.solution: Use the 1k version instead, which works much better

troubleshooting.problem: Fun InP MPS becoming buggy at 4 steps
troubleshooting.solution: Use exactly 3 steps for clean results

troubleshooting.problem: CausVid strength too high for T2V 1.3B
troubleshooting.solution: Lower CausVid strength to 0.5 for better results

troubleshooting.problem: MultiTalk only using first image in looping setup
troubleshooting.solution: Need to loop both text prompts and images for MultiTalk, not just the prompts

troubleshooting.problem: Flux face/chin dimple persisting despite NAG
troubleshooting.solution: Try NAG prompts like 'pointy chin, sharp chin, cleft chin, chin dimple' but effect varies by seed

troubleshooting.problem: Tensor errors when connecting Flux Kontext to MultiTalk in loops
troubleshooting.solution: RGBA vs RGB channel mismatch - ensure all images have same number of channels before concatenation

troubleshooting.problem: Generation time slows drastically after 10-15 generations
troubleshooting.solution: Common issue affecting many users, time changes from 350sec to 1000sec on 4090 after multiple generations

troubleshooting.problem: Context windows causing visual jumps every 81 frames
troubleshooting.solution: Issue with I2V context windows resending first frame repeatedly - attempted progressive reference frame system but resulted in noise/negative frames

troubleshooting.problem: OOM on RTX 5090 with smaller model
troubleshooting.solution: 10 second video was too long, caused memory issues

troubleshooting.problem: Chatterbox nodes breaking ComfyUI installation
troubleshooting.solution: Remove the nodes to save ComfyUI installation

troubleshooting.problem: UltraWan LoRA keys not loading in wrapper
troubleshooting.solution: May need to update wrapper version

troubleshooting.problem: Context options mess up video-to-video results
troubleshooting.solution: Cannot use context options for video-to-video workflow

troubleshooting.problem: All frames coming out black
troubleshooting.solution: Update diffusers library

troubleshooting.problem: Color shifting in VACE extend
troubleshooting.solution: Have a start image on the original video to prevent color shifting

troubleshooting.problem: Need multitalk branch for wrapper
troubleshooting.solution: Switch to multitalk branch: git fetch --all, git switch multitalk

troubleshooting.problem: Slow generation times on 4090 24GB
troubleshooting.solution: Increase block_swap from 10 to 25-40, monitor until speed improves

troubleshooting.problem: Color shifting and compounding sharpening in extensions
troubleshooting.solution: Try no reference frames, increase steps to 12, use longer prompts, try CFG 3

troubleshooting.problem: MultitTalk missing dependency error
troubleshooting.solution: pip install pyloudnorm package

troubleshooting.problem: Upscaling very pixelated videos
troubleshooting.solution: Use higher denoise (0.7-0.8) and blur input slightly to reduce noise amplification

troubleshooting.problem: VACE and MultiTalk layer conflicts
troubleshooting.solution: Modified wrapper patches VACE to ignore MultiTalk layers by processing them as no-op, allowing both to work together

troubleshooting.problem: MultiTalk settings for 720p unclear
troubleshooting.solution: Use audio cfg 2, cfg 2, 5 steps 4 shift, audio scale 1.5-2 for 720p model

troubleshooting.problem: White background artifacts in upscaling
troubleshooting.solution: Changing background color to black or green solved artifacts that appeared on white backgrounds

troubleshooting.problem: OOM issues with high resolution
troubleshooting.solution: Use block swapping or FusionX GGUF model to handle memory constraints

troubleshooting.problem: pyloudnorm package not found error in MultiTalk
troubleshooting.solution: Install using the specific Python executable: python_embeded\python.exe -m pip install pyloudnorm

troubleshooting.problem: Steps showing one less than set in console
troubleshooting.solution: Console shows steps minus 1, so set to 5 to get actual 4 steps

troubleshooting.problem: Black screen in video combine node
troubleshooting.solution: Check show preview enabled setting or check output folder directly

troubleshooting.problem: Phantom I2V requires second image input
troubleshooting.solution: Use black, white, or any placeholder image as second input - it gets ignored

troubleshooting.problem: 1.3B VACE model AttributeError with WanVideoSampler
troubleshooting.solution: Use the module version from Kijai's repo: Wan2_1-VACE_module_1_3B_bf16.safetensors

troubleshooting.problem: MultiTalk wav2vec error
troubleshooting.solution: Use correct wav2vec model

troubleshooting.problem: MagRef tensor mismatch on nonstandard ratios
troubleshooting.solution: Use standard aspect ratios like 1024x576 instead of 1024x600

troubleshooting.problem: Black outputs with fp8_e4m3fn quantization
troubleshooting.solution: Use fp16 without quantization for stable results, slightly slower but no black outputs

troubleshooting.problem: Wan I2V blue chunks output
troubleshooting.solution: Remove weights from positive text prompts

troubleshooting.problem: Color picker nodes not working
troubleshooting.solution: Issue with recent updates affecting color picker system in multiple node packs

troubleshooting.problem: VRAM OOM with VACE embeds
troubleshooting.solution: Use distorch node and set RAM limits, clear RAM between runs

troubleshooting.problem: RuntimeError about tensors on different devices when using multiple control inputs
troubleshooting.solution: Not fully resolved in the discussion

troubleshooting.problem: mat1 and mat2 shapes multiplication error in WanVideo Diffusion Forcing Sampler
troubleshooting.solution: Switch from fp8 to fp16 version of umt5-xxl-enc-fp8_e4m3fn.safetensors file

troubleshooting.problem: Color/brightness variation with lightx2v LoRA
troubleshooting.solution: Use image saturation node between decoder and video combine at 0.85-0.90 values

troubleshooting.problem: OOM issues with Multitalk on 3090
troubleshooting.solution: Reduce frame count - 500 frames worked, 1440 caused OOM, trying 720

troubleshooting.problem: Audio frame length mismatch in Multitalk
troubleshooting.solution: Calculate frames by multiplying audio seconds by chosen FPS, change settings in 3 places: frame, multitask node, and VHS node

troubleshooting.problem: Black output from multitalk v2v workflow
troubleshooting.solution: Update LoRAs with correct local models - LightX takes over for CausVid

troubleshooting.problem: Missing connections in workflow after loading
troubleshooting.solution: Restart ComfyUI or update it - workflow loads correctly on fresh install

troubleshooting.problem: OOM on 4090 with upscaler workflow
troubleshooting.solution: Enable block swap to reduce VRAM usage

troubleshooting.problem: OOM issues under 81 frames on 48GB card
troubleshooting.solution: Enable context options which resolved the issue completely

troubleshooting.problem: PreviewImage 'NoneType' object is not subscriptable error
troubleshooting.solution: Check that base examples node is in inputs folder, can replace with any image

troubleshooting.problem: Classic Wan error with wrong frame count or image size
troubleshooting.solution: Check frame count and image dimensions are correct

troubleshooting.problem: MultiTalk doesn't work with context options
troubleshooting.solution: Image begins to shift when context windows take over, even with higher context_overlap

troubleshooting.problem: OOM issues when upscaling
troubleshooting.solution: Use context options with block swap set to 40, allows processing any amount of frames

troubleshooting.problem: VACE default negatives work against source image
troubleshooting.solution: Default negatives (especially Chinese ones referencing 'colorful, artwork, painting') can hurt realism if not going for realistic output

troubleshooting.problem: Reference images cause wicked flash in VACE workflows
troubleshooting.solution: Issue noted, no specific solution provided

troubleshooting.problem: Tensor dimension mismatch error when going from 720x1280 to 1080x1920
troubleshooting.solution: Change divisible by to 16, use 1088 and crop after the fact if needed

troubleshooting.problem: LightX LoRA causes overexposure in outputs
troubleshooting.solution: Reduce steps from 6 to 4 and set lightx strength from 1.2 to 1.0

troubleshooting.problem: MMaudio OOMing on 44 second videos
troubleshooting.solution: Use smaller model (mmaudio_small) or split audio into shorter segments

troubleshooting.problem: RecamMaster artifacts
troubleshooting.solution: Use Uni3C instead

troubleshooting.problem: People talking in generations despite negative prompts
troubleshooting.solution: Adjust NAG node values, reference provided to parameter breakdown

troubleshooting.problem: OOM errors when loading LoRAs
troubleshooting.solution: Enable low vram mode on the wrapper lora node - takes longer to load but prevents OOM

troubleshooting.problem: Video resolution not working
troubleshooting.solution: Resolution needs to be divisible by 16. Change 1920x1080 to 1920x1072

troubleshooting.problem: KSampler mat1 and mat2 shapes error
troubleshooting.solution: Dimensions aren't a multiple of 16

troubleshooting.problem: Full OOM error in multitalk
troubleshooting.solution: Remove all purge caching stuff as it confuses ComfyUI which handles that automatically (native nodes guarantee this)

troubleshooting.problem: OOM issues with upscaler workflow
troubleshooting.solution: Increase block swap setting

troubleshooting.problem: Camera shake in I2V generations
troubleshooting.solution: Set the problematic setting to 0 to remove shake

troubleshooting.problem: Resize node causing errors
troubleshooting.solution: On resize nodes, avoid choosing 'resize' on the keep proportions selection as this can cause errors

troubleshooting.problem: Canny preprocessor maxing out 24GB VRAM and OOM
troubleshooting.solution: Use an unload node after the preprocessor to manage VRAM usage

troubleshooting.problem: Color problems and changes with CausVid
troubleshooting.solution: CausVid for 1.3B completely changes colors, visible in details like moss on wood

troubleshooting.problem: Self-forcing and speed LoRAs not properly implemented
troubleshooting.solution: ComfyUI only benefits from part of what self-forcing and CausVid can do, similar to how CausVid isn't properly implemented

troubleshooting.problem: Random flashing/color shift in upscaled videos
troubleshooting.solution: Issue originates in low-res generation causing flashes, needs to be fixed at generation stage

troubleshooting.problem: Multitalk error with transformers update
troubleshooting.solution: Downgrade transformers to version 4.52.4

troubleshooting.problem: MMAudio installation breaking existing WAN workflows
troubleshooting.solution: Installing MMAudio requirements can cause VRAM/memory issues and workflow failures

troubleshooting.problem: GPU running at 92C and throttling
troubleshooting.solution: Temperature is too high and causing performance issues

troubleshooting.problem: Loading both VACE and WAN in native flow
troubleshooting.solution: Need VACE version that includes 14B model, recommend Q8 GGUF version

troubleshooting.problem: RAM not clearing after failed runs
troubleshooting.solution: Disable non-blocking transfers or restart ComfyUI to clear pinned memory

troubleshooting.problem: MultiTalk with VACE compatibility issues
troubleshooting.solution: Use multitalk branch of WanVideoWrapper or apply patches from Rudra-ai-coder fork

troubleshooting.problem: Context window error in workflow
troubleshooting.solution: Error was fixed in recent update, may need to update WanVideoWrapper

troubleshooting.problem: Color Match node issues with dark reference images
troubleshooting.solution: Color match with mkl sometimes messes up if reference image is dark, consider using hm-mvgd-hm instead

troubleshooting.problem: VACE with MultiTalk model mismatch
troubleshooting.solution: When using VACE module, must use T2V model not I2V model
